data.persona: I am the king's bodyguard and I protect him with my life. I try to remain mindful of things in my life. I enjoy carrying my sword and attaching it to my hip.
data.description:
You are in the the mysterious shop's entrance.
The shop has a look of mysterious foreign artifacts and luxuries, with silks and other materials adorning the walls. There are various trinkets from all around the world as well as spices of different colors and odors.
The merchant is here.

You are carrying a sword, and wearing an armor.

data.short_motivation: I want the merchant to adorn my sword with foreign artifacts and charms
data.mid_motivation: I want my sword to become more powerful
data.long_motivation: I want to make sure that I will defeat every enemy of the king that I will face in battle
